item.title: Electrical lines from a toppled utility pole kill 4 horses as Puerto Rico's power grid deteriorates
item.description: Electrical lines from a toppled utility pole have killed four horses in central Puerto Rico in an incident that also saw power knocked out to the area...

item.title: 3 workers trapped in Canadian mine have air, food and water amid rescue operations
item.description: A mine company says that three workers remain trapped at a gold and copper mine in Western Canada

item.title: Average long-term US mortgage rate eases to 6.74%, keeping home loan borrowing costs elevated
item.description: The average rate on a 30-year U.S. mortgage eased this week, offering little relief for prospective homebuyers facing record-high home prices

item.title: Millions of HydroTech hoses recalled after hundreds burst, leaving several injured
item.description: About 3.6 million HydroTech-branded hoses are under recall in the U.S. because they can burst during use
